english.segment1: Gone away, gone away forever. Not to come back home. I did stay all the night through with you. Without knowing youd gone
english.segment2: Without time for the world to breathe on. The changing dust it woke. Glimpses of all the life you poured out. Till the vessel broke
english.segment3: Dont know if Ill see you. When its my turn to come home. Dont know if Ill see you. But I hope so, but I hope so
english.segment4: Parting now at our own Grey Havens. The words you left the debris. So be still, knowing that Hell see you across the Sea
english.segment5: Dont know if Ill see you. When its my turn to come home. Dont know if Ill see you. But I hope so, but I hope so
english.segment6: To be woken from the long sleep. Of this worlds night
english.segment7: Dont know if Ill see you. When its my turn to come home. Dont know if Ill see you. But I hope so, but I hope so
